Description.Title: SoilTemperature
Description.ExtendedDescription: A C# soil temperature component which simulates soil surface and profile temperatures by solving 1-D heat conduction with energy balance terms following Campbell (1985). The soil is discretised into nodes (air, surface, one per layer, plus phantom nodes below). Sub-daily iterations (default 48 per day) solve a tridiagonal system (Thomas algorithm) using net radiation, sensible and latent heat fluxes, and an atmospheric boundary layer conductance (calculated or constant). Thermal conductivity and volumetric heat capacity are derived from soil properties (bulk density, texture, rocks, carbon) and water content. Inputs come from weather (temperature, radiation, wind, pressure) and soil water/canopy states; outputs include daily min/mean/max soil temperatures, surface temperature, and profiles of heat capacity and thermal conductivity.
Description.ShortDescription: 1-D soil temperature profile model with sub-daily heat flow and energy balance based on Campbell (1985).

Input.name: physical_Thickness
Input.description: Soil layer thickness by layer

Input.name: physical_BD
Input.description: Soil bulk density by layer

Input.name: physical_Rocks
Input.description: Rock fragments percentage by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
Input.description: Sand fraction percentage by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
Input.description: Silt fraction percentage by layer

Input.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
Input.description: Clay fraction percentage by layer

Input.name: organic_Carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon percentage by layer

Input.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
Input.description: Depth below which soil temperature is assumed constant

Input.name: instrumHeight
Input.description: Measurement instrument height above ground used for boundary layer calculations

Input.name: nu
Input.description: Numerical scheme weighting parameter (Crank-Nicolson factor)

Input.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
Input.description: Boundary layer conductance source: 'calc' or 'constant'

Input.name: netRadiationSource
Input.description: Net radiation source: 'calc' or alternative energy balance from Eos

Input.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
Input.description: Default time of maximum air temperature within the day

Input.name: waterBalance_SW
Input.description: Soil water content by layer

Input.name: weather_Tav
Input.description: Average annual soil surface temperature driver

Input.name: weather_Amp
Input.description: Annual temperature amplitude driver

Input.name: weather_Latitude
Input.description: Latitude for radiation and phase of seasonal soil temperature

Input.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
Input.description: Current day of year

Input.name: weather_MeanT
Input.description: Mean daily air temperature

Input.name: weather_MaxT
Input.description: Maximum daily air temperature

Input.name: weather_MinT
Input.description: Minimum daily air temperature

Input.name: weather_AirPressure
Input.description: Air pressure at measurement height

Input.name: weather_Wind
Input.description: Wind speed at instrument height

Input.name: weather_Radn
Input.description: Daily incoming shortwave radiation

Input.name: waterBalance_Salb
Input.description: Soil albedo (shortwave reflectance)

Input.name: waterBalance_Eos
Input.description: Soil evaporation (potential or constrained) used in energy balance

Input.name: waterBalance_Eo
Input.description: Reference evaporation used for radiative penetration ratio

Input.name: waterBalance_Es
Input.description: Actual soil evaporation for latent heat flux in energy balance

Input.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
Input.description: Canopy height used for roughness calculations

Input.name: InitialValues
Input.description: Optional initial soil temperatures by layer (applied on first call if provided)

Input.name: numNodes
Input.description: Total number of computational nodes (layers + phantom nodes)

Input.name: numLayers
Input.description: Number of physical soil layers

Input.name: nodeDepth
Input.description: Depth of each node from the soil surface

Input.name: thickness
Input.description: Thickness of layers including phantom nodes where applicable

Input.name: bulkDensity
Input.description: Bulk density by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

Input.name: rocks
Input.description: Rock fragments percentage by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

Input.name: carbon
Input.description: Organic carbon percentage by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

Input.name: sand
Input.description: Sand percentage by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

Input.name: silt
Input.description: Silt percentage by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

Input.name: clay
Input.description: Clay percentage by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

Input.name: soilWater
Input.description: Water content per layer/node (internal representation)

Input.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Input.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil by node

Input.name: soilTemp
Input.description: Soil temperature by node

Input.name: morningSoilTemp
Input.description: Soil temperature profile captured at ~5 AM

Input.name: newTemperature
Input.description: Workspace for updated soil temperatures (including air and bottom boundary nodes)

Input.name: thermalConductivity
Input.description: Thermal conductivity by node; at air node holds boundary layer conductance

Input.name: heatStorage
Input.description: Heat storage capacity term per node per internal time step

Input.name: thermalConductance
Input.description: Thermal conductance between nodes (including air node and bottom boundary)

Input.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Input.description: Daily-averaged boundary layer conductance accumulator

Input.name: airTemperature
Input.description: Interpolated air temperature for current sub-daily step

Input.name: maxTempYesterday
Input.description: Previous day's maximum air temperature used for diurnal interpolation

Input.name: minTempYesterday
Input.description: Previous day's minimum air temperature used for diurnal interpolation

Input.name: minSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily minimum soil temperature by node (reset each day)

Input.name: maxSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily maximum soil temperature by node (reset each day)

Input.name: aveSoilTemp
Input.description: Daily average soil temperature by node (accumulated over sub-daily steps)

Input.name: soilRoughnessHeight
Input.description: Bare soil roughness height used in canopy/roughness calculations

Input.name: instrumentHeight
Input.description: Instrument height used in stability and conductance calculations (adjusted to be above canopy)

Input.name: netRadiation
Input.description: Net radiation into soil per internal time step (shortwave + longwave)

Input.name: canopyHeight
Input.description: Effective canopy height (at least soil roughness height)

Input.name: instrumHeight
Input.description: Original instrument height parameter captured in state (if provided)

Input.name: internalTimeStep
Input.description: Length of internal time step in seconds

Input.name: timeOfDaySecs
Input.description: Current time within the day for sub-daily iteration

Input.name: doInitialisationStuff
Input.description: Flag indicating first call initialisation is pending

Output.name: soilTemp
Output.description: Updated soil temperature profile by node at end of day

Output.name: newTemperature
Output.description: Latest computed temperature workspace including boundary nodes

Output.name: minSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily minimum soil temperature by node

Output.name: maxSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily maximum soil temperature by node

Output.name: aveSoilTemp
Output.description: Daily average soil temperature by node

Output.name: morningSoilTemp
Output.description: Soil temperature snapshot at ~5 AM

Output.name: soilWater
Output.description: Updated soil water content (internal per-layer representation)

Output.name: volSpecHeatSoil
Output.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil by node for current conditions

Output.name: thermalConductivity
Output.description: Thermal conductivity by node; air node holds boundary layer conductance

Output.name: heatStorage
Output.description: Heat storage term per node over the internal time step

Output.name: thermalConductance
Output.description: Thermal conductance between nodes used in the tridiagonal solver

Output.name: netRadiation
Output.description: Net radiation into the soil at each sub-daily step (last value retained)

Output.name: boundaryLayerConductance
Output.description: Daily mean boundary layer conductance accumulated over sub-daily steps

Output.name: instrumentHeight
Output.description: Adjusted instrument height ensuring it is above canopy

Output.name: canopyHeight
Output.description: Effective canopy height (m)

Output.name: airTemperature
Output.description: Interpolated air temperature at current sub-daily step (last value retained)

Output.name: internalTimeStep
Output.description: Internal time step duration used for sub-daily integration

Output.name: timeOfDaySecs
Output.description: Time-counter within the day for sub-daily loop (last value)

Output.name: maxTempYesterday
Output.description: Yesterday's maximum air temperature updated at end of day

Output.name: minTempYesterday
Output.description: Yesterday's minimum air temperature updated at end of day

Output.name: InitialValues
Output.description: Initial profile stored in state after first-time setup (if provided or computed)

Output.name: doInitialisationStuff
Output.description: Flag set to False after completing first-call initialisation

Function.name: Divide
Function.description: Safe division with fallback value when denominator is zero.

Function.name: ValuesInArray
Function.description: Checks if an array contains at least one valid value (not 999999 and not NaN).

Function.name: Sum
Function.description: Sums values in a list from startIndex to endIndex, skipping sentinel values.

Function.name: Zero
Function.description: Sets all elements of an array to 0.0.

Function.name: ToCumThickness
Function.description: Computes cumulative thickness from layer thicknesses.

Function.name: boundCheck
Function.description: Placeholder for range checking of variables.

Function.name: kelvinT
Function.description: Converts Celsius temperature to Kelvin.

Function.name: longWaveRadn
Function.description: Computes longwave radiation using Stefan-Boltzmann law.

Function.name: airDensity
Function.description: Computes air density from temperature and air pressure.

Function.name: copy_state
Function.description: Shallow copy of state dict with list values copied by slicing.

Function.name: volumetricFractionRocks
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks in a given layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of organic matter in a given layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSand
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of sand in a given layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionSilt
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of silt in a given layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionClay
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of clay in a given layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionWater
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of water in a given layer.

Function.name: volumetricFractionIce
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of ice in a given layer (currently zero).

Function.name: volumetricFractionAir
Function.description: Volumetric fraction of air in a given layer.

Function.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Returns specific heat capacity constant for soil constituents.

Function.name: ThermalConductance
Function.description: Returns thermal conductance constant for soil constituents.

Function.name: shapeFactor
Function.description: Returns shape factor for soil constituents used in conductivity mixing.

Function.name: mapLayer2Node
Function.description: Interpolates layer-centered values to node-centered values.

Function.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
Function.description: Computes empirical coefficients for thermal conductivity based on bulk density and clay.

Function.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
Function.description: Computes volumetric specific heat by node and maps it to nodes.

Function.name: doThermalConductivity
Function.description: Computes effective thermal conductivity per layer and maps to nodes.

Function.name: doThomas
Function.description: Solves the tridiagonal system for heat diffusion (Thomas algorithm) and updates new temperatures.

Function.name: interpolateTemperature
Function.description: Generates diurnal air temperature from daily min/max/mean using sinusoidal interpolation.

Function.name: doUpdate
Function.description: Commits new temperatures, updates min/max/avg soil temperatures, and accumulates boundary layer conductance.

Function.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
Function.description: Computes boundary layer conductance considering wind, stability, and radiative conductance.

Function.name: calcSoilTemperature
Function.description: Initial seasonal soil temperature profile using damped sinusoidal propagation with depth.

Function.name: calcLayerTemperature
Function.description: Layer temperature given phase lag and damping depth.

Function.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Initial surface temperature from mean/max air temperature, radiation, and albedo.

Function.name: doNetRadiation
Function.description: Distributes daily shortwave radiation over sub-daily steps and estimates cloud fraction and vapour term proxy.

Function.name: interpolateNetRadiation
Function.description: Computes sub-daily net radiation to soil (shortwave and longwave components).

Function.name: math_sin
Function.description: Wrapper for math.sin.

Function.name: math_cos
Function.description: Wrapper for math.cos.

Function.name: math_sqrt
Function.description: Wrapper for math.sqrt.

Function.name: math_log
Function.description: Safe natural log returning large negative value for non-positive inputs.

Function.name: math_exp
Function.description: Wrapper for math.exp.

Function.name: math_pi
Function.description: Wrapper returning math.pi.

Function.name: FinalSoilTemperature
Function.description: Extracts final soil temperature by physical layer.

Function.name: FinalSoilSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Returns final surface node temperature.

Function.name: AverageSoilTemperature
Function.description: Extracts daily average soil temperature by physical layer.

Function.name: AverageSoilSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Returns daily average surface temperature.

Function.name: MinimumSoilTemperature
Function.description: Extracts daily minimum soil temperature by physical layer.

Function.name: MinimumSoilSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Returns daily minimum surface temperature.

Function.name: MaximumSoilTemperature
Function.description: Extracts daily maximum soil temperature by physical layer.

Function.name: MaximumSoilSurfaceTemperature
Function.description: Returns daily maximum surface temperature.

Function.name: BoundaryLayerConductance
Function.description: Returns the daily mean boundary layer conductance.

Function.name: ThermalConductivity_profile
Function.description: Returns thermal conductivity profile for nodes (excluding air node).

Function.name: HeatCapacity_profile
Function.description: Returns volumetric specific heat profile for nodes.

Function.name: HeatStore_profile
Function.description: Returns heat storage profile for nodes.

Function.name: Thr_profile
Function.description: Returns stored early-morning soil temperature profile.
